name: Target Dashboard
tag_list: online-dashboard, dashboard, kpi-dashboard, online-business-dashboards, dashboard-software, performance-dashboard, executive-dashboards, financial-dashboards, management-dashboards, business-inteliigence, management-reports
overview:
Overview â€“ Target Dashboard is a web based Key Performance Indicator dashboard application.

Aimed at Managers, the application is accessible via PC, Mac or iPad, 24x7. The application has easy to use, clear charting and takes just 10 minutes from start to finish to set up. It enables Managers to spot trends, do comparisons and make quicker and better business decisions. Functionality includes Dashboards and scorecards, very easy charting, automatic alerting and simple management of data either manually or from remote data sources.

3 premium versions are available to suit all types of needs and a free version is available.
